#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       string a;
       vector<char> b;
       int c,e;
       bool d=false;
       
       getline(cin,a);
       
       c = a.length();
       
       for(int i=0;i<c;i++)
       {
         if(isspace(a[i]) != 0 && !d)
         {
           b.push_back(a[i]);
           d=true;
         }
         else if(isalnum(a[i]) != 0 || ispunct(a[i]) != 0)
         {
           b.push_back(a[i]);
           d=false;
         } 
       }
       
       e = b.size();
       
       for(int i=0;i<e;i++)
        cout << b[i];
        cout << endl;
        
        return 0;
        }
